welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Reidsville, a charming and historic city known for its small town feel and friendly locals. We invite you to explore our local shops, restaurants, and attractions and soak in the unique charm of our city. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Piedmont Triad International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Piedmont Triad International Airport serves domestic flights operated by American Airlines and Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Piedmont Triad International Airport serves domestic flights operated by United Airlines, Allegiant Air, and Frontier Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Piedmont Triad International Airport serves international flights operated by Air Canada and WestJet.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport is responsible for handling all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
